title: Biden Antitrust Nominee Gets Warm Senate Reception
sub_head: Jonathan Kanter promises strong enforcement if confirmed as Justice Department antitrust chief
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden’s nominee to lead the Justice Department’s antitrust division sailed through his Senate confirmation hearing Wednesday, pledging strong enforcement and receiving bipartisan support from lawmakers concerned about corporate dominance.
“Liberty depends on opportunity and opportunity depends on free, fair, competitive markets. And the antitrust laws play a vital role in preserving these opportunities,” nominee Jonathan Kanter said before the Senate Judiciary Committee.
